idea-plugin.name: CodeStats
idea-plugin.description:
CodeStats Plugin

CodeStats is an open source plugin for JetBrains IDE's that provides insightful statistics about your project. It helps you understand your codebase better by providing detailed metrics such as:

  • Line counts
  • File sizes
  • Blank Lines
  • Comment Lines
  • Documentations Lines
  • And more...

With CodeStats, you can easily measure your project's size and source code line count.

Features

  • Easy-to-use interface with custom tool window
  • Customizable via custom settings menu
  • Faster than other popular statistic plugins

Getting Started

After installing the plugin, you can access CodeStats from the 'View' menu in IntelliJ. Select 'ToolWindows'->'CodeStats' to open the plugin window and start exploring your project's statistics.

Contributing

If you encounter any issues or want to contribute, please feel free to visit the CodeStats GitHub page.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Release 1.4.0

  • Plugin settings are not project specific
  • Removed left over debug print-Statements (Ups!)
  • Added more file types to the basic exclusion option (.gitignore)
  • Improved parsing for comment and documentation lines

Release 1.3.0

  • Fixed bug where excluded directories are not loaded correctly
  • Changed icon colors for better visibility

Release 1.2.0

  • Added support for python comment lines
  • Added charset (UTF-8,...) selector in settings
  • Fixed bug that prevented changing settings before opening the tool window once
  • Fixed bug where excluded dir settings didn't reset correctly
  • Source code lines do not include documentation lines anymore
  • Added more settings to exclude common non-source directories

Release 1.1.0

  • Improved general performance
  • Added accurate comment and documentation lines parsing
  • Added a file type white-list to settings
  • Added button to disable automatic updates
  • Added punctuation to file size numbers

Release 1.0.0!
